ARABIC: وَمَا تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You do not ask them for any wage for it. It is only a reminder to all beings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Even though you ask no recompense (for it). It is only a warning for all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You do not seek from them any recompense for your service. This is merely an admonition to all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You do not ask any reward for your preaching (of Our guidance to them). This (Quran) is a guide for the people of the world (human beings and jinn).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You do not ask them any fee in return for it; this is not but an advice to the entire world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And no reward you ask of them for it; it (the Qur'an) is no less than a Reminder unto the `Alamin (men and Jinn).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And you do not ask them for a reward for this; it is nothing but a reminder for all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thou askest of them no wage for it; it is nothing but a reminder unto all beings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou askest them no fee for it. It is naught else than a reminder unto the peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You shall not ask them for any reward for this. It is but a reminder for all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thou askest them not any hire therefor; it is but an admonition unto the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You do not ask them any reward for it: it is just a reminder for all the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And no reward dost thou ask of them for this: it is no less than a message for all creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And no reward you (O Muhammad SAW) ask of them (those who deny your Prophethood) for it, it (the Quran) is no less than a Reminder and an advice unto the 'Alamin (men and jinns).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You shall ask no wage for it. It is nothing except a reminder to all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You ask them no wage for it. It is only a reminder for all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you do not ask of them for it any payment. It is not except a reminder to the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:104] Nor do you ask them any wage, that you should take, for it, that is, [for] the Qur’ān — it, namely, the Qur’ān, is but a reminder, an admonition, to all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thou askest them) Muhammad (no fee) no payment (for it) for the profession of monotheism. (It is) i.e. the Qur'an (naught else than a reminder) an admonition (unto the peoples) unto the jinn and humans.
